# Starting Abilities
## Absorb DNA
[color=#999999][italic]0 Chems[italic][/color]
- Allows you to slowly and noisily absorb a dead, crit, or cuffed crewmate. This adds their DNA to your pool, gives you 2 evolution points, and refills your biomass. - If another changeling is absorbed, you instead get 10 more evolution points, +60 max chemicals, and +15 max biomass/ - Target must be in a HARD grab to use this ability. - Can be used in lesser form. ## Extract DNA Sting
[color=#999999][italic]25 Chems[italic][/color]
- Adds the stung player's DNA to your pool. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Cycle DNA
[color=#999999][italic]0 Chems[italic][/color]
- Changes the active DNA used for transform. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Transform
[color=#999999][italic]5 Chems[italic][/color]
- Transforms you to have the exact name and voice of your currently active DNA, consumes the DNA. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Enter Regenerative Statis
[color=#999999][italic]All Chems, 1 biomass[italic][/color]
- Changeling instantly dies, and the exit stasis ability is unlocked. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Exit Regenerative Statis
[color=#999999][italic]60 Chems[italic][/color]
- Changeling instantly revives, all health is fully recovered. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
# Combat Abilities
## Dissonant Shriek
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 30 Chems / 1 Absorbed Organic [italic][/color]
- Changeling emits an EMP blast, disabling borgs, IPCs, suit coordinates, and other electronic equipment. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Organic Shield
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 20 Chems / 1 Absorbed Organic [italic][/color]
- Grows one of its arms into a robust shield, absorbs 50% of incoming damage until destroyed.
## Resonant Shriek
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 30 Chems / 1 Absorbed Organic [italic][/color]
- Screeches, blinding anyone in the nearby area without flash protection, breaks nearby lights as well. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Strained Muscles
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 0 Chems [italic][/color]
- Speeds the changeling up greatly, but deals heavy stamina damage over time to self. Toggles on and off. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Bone Shard
[color=#999999][italic] 3 Evolution Points / 15 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling forms a bone shard throwing weapon that hardstuns in two hits, shards dissolve after a short while.
## Dart Gun
[color=#999999][italic] 3 Evolution Points / 15 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling forms an arm into a dart gun. Dart gun fires any of the lings evolved stings, costs 1/3 the stings cost in chems per shot.
## Arm Blade
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 15 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling forms an arm into a blade. Deals heavy limb damage on light attack when targeting a limb.
## Arm Claw
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 15 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling forms an arm into a claw. Claw can grab organics and prevent them from moving. Claw cannot be used to attack while grabbing.
## Arm Hammer
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 15 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling forms an arm into a hammer. Deals blunt damage, knocks down, and flings targets on light attack.
## Chitinous Armor
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 25 Chems / 2 Absorbed Organics [italic][/color]
- Changeling forms body into a mass of armor, only usable when outerwear and head slots are empty. - Armor slows ling by 15 percent - Armor reduces all damage by 50 percent - Head armor reduces brute and burn damages by 10 percent
# Stings Abilities
## Blind Sting
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 20 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling injects organic with 2 units of blind toxin, blinding the target for 12 seconds. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form. - Does not work on Yowies. - Can stack with itself.
## Cryogenic Sting
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 20 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling injects organic with 10 units of fresium, dropping their temperature to 0 degrees Celsius in most cases. - Cold organics move far slower. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form. - Can stack with itself.
## Mute Sting
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 20 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling injects organic with 2 units of mute toxin, muting the target for 40 seconds. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form. - Can stack with itself. - Does not work on Yowies.
## Lethargic Sting
[color=#999999][italic] 3 Evolution Points / 30 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling injects organic with 5 units of impredrezene and tirizene, causing numerous effects. - Slows target by 35% - Deals 20 poison damage - Deals 15 stamina damage per second for ten seconds - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form. - Can stack with itself. - Does not work on Yowies.
## False Armblade Sting
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 50 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling injects organic with some of its genome, forcing the organic to grow a temporary useless armblade. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form. - Lasts roughly 60 seconds.
# Utility Abilities
## Anatomic Panacea
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 30 Chems [italic][/color]
- Produces 10 units of Ling Panacea within the changeling. - Heals 60 genetic damage. - Heals 30 of both radiation and poison. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Last Resort
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 20 Chems [italic][/color]
- Explodes the changelings current body and turns them into a headslug. - Headslugs are extremely fast, can ventcrawl, and can crawl under doors. - It can be used while cuffed but cannot be used in lesser form. - Headslugs can infect a non-hollow corpse to turn into a lesser form changeling after a short timer. - If the infected body is destroyed, the headslug will not revive, and will be forever lost.
## Lesser Form
[color=#999999][italic] 2 Evolution Points / 20 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling turns into a monkey. - Uncuffs changeling. - Money can ventcrawl, but loses some abilities that the ling would otherwise have.
## Absorb Biomatter
[color=#999999][italic] 3 Evolution Points [italic][/color]
- Consuming meat products restores the changelings chemical stores.
## Augmented Eyesight
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 0 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling can toggle eyesight between flash resistant and thermal vision. - While using thermal vision, flashes stun the changeling for twice as long. - Thermal vision also provides changeling with night vision. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Biodegrade
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 30 Chems [italic][/color]
- Burns cuffs off the changeling. - Uncuffs changeling. - Splashes anyone grabbing changeling with acid, doing slight caustic damage. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Chameleon Skin
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 20 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling gains invisibility. - Invisibility increases while standing still. - Invisibility rapidly decreases while moving. - Can be used while cuffed.
## Ephedrine Overdose
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 30 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling produces 5 units of Desoxyephdrine - Deals 7.5 poison damage to changeling. - Increases speed greatly, and removes stuns. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
## Hivemind Access
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points [italic][/color]
- Shows a symbol above all changelings with this ability. - Togglable on and off. - Grants access to the hivemind channel - :g
## Space Adaptation
[color=#999999][italic] 4 Evolution Points / 20 Chems [italic][/color]
- Replaces outerwear with an organic space suit. - Changeling still requires oxygen.
## Fleshmend
[color=#999999][italic] 5 Evolution Points / 35 Chems [italic][/color]
- Changeling produces 10 units of changeling fleshmenders. - Heals 55 of each brute damage. - Heals 60 burn damage. - Usable while in critical condition. - Can be used while cuffed or in lesser form.
